questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: 3 years ago, I went to New-York in June. It was my best holiday at all because this famous city that never sleep is a wonderfull city ! I went there with my parents and my little brother. Every morning we went to a Starbuck to eat bagels and to drink a coffee like a real New-Yorker. We saw a lot of famous places like Times Square, China town, and so one. We also saw many places of movies, it was very cool !
The squiels in Central park are so cute and Central park is a place so beautifull; we went there to relax us. I have kept a really good memory of this travel !
